flawed_nl_solution:
Monica has 20+25+25+28+28=<<20+25+25+28+28=162>>162 in 5 of her classes.
In the fourth class, she has 20/2=<<20/2=10>>10 students.
In total, she has 162+10=<<162+10=172>>172 students per day.
#### 172

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 126, not 162. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
